author: bdelacretaz
msg: SLING-3297 - fix tests and add some public mbox test files

author: peter_firmstone
msg: After considerable testing using a multi threaded Executor and Runnable tasks to CAS an AtomicLong to generate 100% cpu load, no data races were found, it is suspected that Object.wait is subject to spurious wake-up's on some platforms when they are not contained within a loop that checks the present condition and this is causing the test failures:

author: bdelacretaz
msg: SLING-3297 - mail archive server sample app, contributed by Igor Bogomolov, thanks!
